title: Bitcoin Options and Derivatives with Bithedge
description:
Blockware Lead Insights Analyst Will Clemente and Derivatives trader and ex-Glassnode employee Bithedge talk about perpetual swaps, options, orderbooks, orderflow and more for our weekly interview Podcast/YouTube channel series. Can now find our podcast on Spotify, Apple, and Google Podcasts as well! 


 Bithedge's Twitter: twitter.com/bit_hedge
dc:creator: Joe Burnett
